name: Bacterial Arcade Game
description:
Bacterial

Simple and easy to control arcade game. Main goal is growing the biggest bacteria as you can. Sacrifice with smaller to feed and grow bigger.

Game made in 3 days for LDJAM #44.

Made in team of four: 

  • gfx code by @alerdenisov, 
  • simulation code by @stas_lisetsky
  • concept art and logotype by @nmewz 
  • and music by @frowrik
